Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: After i . p . injection to rats , abecarnil and diazepam decreased in a time - dependent and dose - related ( 0 . 25 - 20 mg / kg i . p . ) manner [ 35S ] TBPS binding measured ex vivo in the cerebral cortex .

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| Abecarnil |
| Diazepam |
| [35S] TBPS ([35S]-Tetraiodobenzoic acid) |

Explanation:

* "After i.p. injection to rats" refers to the method of administration, not a chemical entity.
* "0.25-20 mg/kg i.p." refers to the dosage range, not a chemical entity.
* "[35S] TBPS" is a chemical entity, specifically a radiolabeled form of Tetraiodobenzoic acid (TBPS).
